channel.title: Significant Battles or Wars Before 1000
channel.description: RSS feed of significant battles or wars before the year 1000.

item.title: Battles of Narol
item.description: The Battles of Narol are a series of armed battles fought over the town of Narol, Poland, and for control of the Narol region between the Home Army supported by Peasant Battalions and the Ukrainian insurgent army during the period May to June 1944.

item.title: Bloody April: The Battle of Shiloh, 1862
item.description: Bloody April: The Battle of Shiloh, 1862 is a board wargame published by Simulations Publications Inc. (SPI) in 1979 that simulates the Battle of Shiloh during the American Civil War. A revised edition published in 2022 by GMT Games became the 8th installment of the ongoing "Great Battles of the American Civil War" series.
